data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Kamuli.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kamuli, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kamuli you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Kamuli. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kamuli, Uganda a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Hindi people. Make the Hindi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Kamuli, Uganda by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kamuli to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kamuli, Uganda, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Kamuli
location.people_groups_list: Chinese, general, Arab, Lebanese, Nubian, Swahili, Gujarati
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chinese, general (19,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Nubian (37,000), Swahili (5,100), Gujarati (465,000)
